Key: Hey... This is...
My room. I guess I fell asleep.

*Yawn*... Okay, I don't remember what I was doing
before I fell asleep.
I feel like I had to do something.

(I can't remember. Well, it must not be very
important then.)

(I've been busy lately and it feels like my room
is a bit messy. I'd better clean it up later...
but...)
...Not today. I'll do it tomorrow...

Hm? I heard footsteps... Could it be Kotori?
Or maybe Tohka's come to visit.
Sh-Shido...!

Oh, what is it? You're here out of the blue. Is
something wrong?
Don't... "is something wrong" me!
...Excuse me?
Shido... what is... the meaning of this...?
What do you mean? What are you talking about?

Your clothes are everywhere, food scraps are
everywhere... Are you serious right now?!
Oh, well, this is...
Shido-kuuuun. This doesn't look good. Even if\nYoshino isn't usually around the house.
She takes her eyes off you one second, and you go\nand live such a lazy life? Yoshinon can't cover\nfor you this time.
Eyes off of me for one second...? Oh, I see...

(...That's right. Despite her young appearance,
Yoshino attends college nearby. She's my older
sister.)

(Normally she lives alone in the next town over,
but she comes by to check in on me from time to
time, along with her friend Yoshinon.)

Sorry, Yoshino and Yoshinon. I was so busy and got
lazy...
Shido...!
Y-Yes?!
*Whimper*...
Wh-What is it, Yoshino?

(Yoshino is glaring at me and trying to tell me
something. I know that much. But... what is it?
What does she want to say?)
Hey, Yoshinon? What does Yoshino want to say?
Seriously? You're going to ask me that?
Grr...

(I can tell she's mad, but I have no idea why. I
don't think it's just because the room is messy.)
MMM! MMMMM!
Sorry. I give up. Please tell me, Yoshinon.
*Sigh*... Fine, Shido-kun. I'll let you in on it\nthis time. Yoshino probably wants you to call\nher O...
Oh, ohhh! I get it.
Hmph... Shido, you idiot.
Sorry, Yoshino. I mean Yoshino-oneechan.
Ah... Okay, okay! I am Shido's onee-chan...!
(Glad she's in a better mood.)

Oh, sorry for being late. Welcome home, onee-chan
and Yoshinon.
All right, I'm going to go clean my room, then.

(Yoshino-oneechan is eyeing me... But she doesn't
have to keep watch. I won't slack off.)

Well, I'm going to clean my room now, so why don't
you rest in the living room, Ne-chan...?
Grr...!
Huh...?

(She's trying to tell me something again. P-Please
just tell me... She is so shy sometimes...)
Sorry, Yoshinon... help me!
Shido-kun... You need to think a little. I think\nYoshino wants to help you.
Really?
...Yes! I do.

I see. But... It's not messy to the point where
I'd need help.

It's nice of you to offer, but I can do this on my
own. Just go ahead and rest...
I want to clean with you, Shido...

Well, if you say so. But... Yoshino... I mean,
Yoshino-oneechan. Aren't you tired?
You just got back, didn't you?
*Whine*...
Oh, your brows are furrowed again. Um...
Hey, Shido-kun. Let me tell you a secret. Yoshino\nwants to take care of you. You are her precious,\nprecious little brother.

Oh, I get it. Haha. Onee-chan, you're so
overprotective.
Awww...?! Um, Shido... Am I annoying you...?
O-O-Of course not! I'd love for you to help!
(And so we started to clean up together.)
Let's clean then.
Here I go.
Shido, that way...
Got it.
And here.
Okay, okay.
Shido-kuuuun. Your clothes are messy here, too.
Got it!

(And that went on for a while. Since she's
watching me from behind, I noticed I had
straightened my posture as well.)

(But, does this really count as her helping me?
*peek*...)

(Oh, seems like Yoshino-oneechan feels like
something's off, too.)

(Yoshinon is eyeing me. I think Yoshino wants to
participate more.)
(Hm. What to do...)
Oh, I'll have her cheer me on.
Do something stupid.
(I guess I'll take the bullet.)

Man, I am so tired. I'm halfway through, but my
body won't move anymore. *peek*...!

(Seems like my acting was a bit fake, but oh well.
It's for Yoshino-oneechan.)

Sh-Shido, you can't! We're almost there... so hang
in there.

I want to, but I can't. I-If only someone could
cheer me on...*peek*!
Huh...?

(No, she doesn't get it! Yoshino-oneechan seems
dumbfounded! Please get the hint. Your little
brother needs you!)
If only someone cheered me on!
Yoshino? I think Shido-kun's out of batteries.
He needs an energy charge?
Exactly. If the adorable Yoshino cheers him on,\nI'm sure it'll be a miracle charge to Shido-kun's\npower, and he'll clean better!

(Good job, Yoshinon! Gonna give you an internal
thumbs up. I feel like Yoshinon is nodding back in
response.)
G-Got it. It's for you, Shido...
...Ahem. Go... Go... Shido!

(Her voice is like a mosquito's. Maybe she got
embarrassed.)
That's no good, Yoshino. Shido-kun won't be\nenergized by that! You need to be louder and\nmore enthusiastic!
Go, fight, win! Shido!

(Oh, her voice is getting louder. And that kinda
makes me happy. It's nice to have a girl cheer
you on.)
You think you can do better now, Shido?

Ah... N-Not yet... I still need more... just
a little more energy.
Yoshino... You have to be able to say...

(Wh-What is going on, Yoshinon? What did you tell
her? She seems super embarrassed. What's going to
happen now...)

G-Good luck, Shido. Onee-chan loves Shido for trying
his best.
I super-duper love Shido for trying his best!

(Wow! I have no choice but to commit now. I can't
let her cheer go to waste!)
Let's get this over with!

(Seems like my plan worked. I started cleaning
like crazy again.)

(Okay. I'm going to change it up. If I clean it all
up myself, then we can't do it together. What
should I do?)

(I have to do something weird that I wouldn't do
normally. That way, Yoshino-oneechan will scold
me... I'll act dumb and have her fix me!)

(...That might be tricky. For now, I'll let
Yoshinon in on my idea. I'm sure she'll get it.)
Yoshinon, Yoshinon.
*Squint*...!
Hmm...? *gasp*!

(All right, the eye contact worked. I don't know
how she did it, but good job, Yoshinon. So...
here I go. Just watch Shido Itsuka act dumb!)

Hey, how weird. No matter how much I wipe the
floor, it won't get cleaner.
Shido...? What's the matter?

(Damn, did that sound so genuine that she didn't
get it?)
Yoshino! You have to direct Shido-kun. You're\nhis older sister.
Ah, that's right. Okay... I'll do my best...

Shido, you're not using the rag. It's on top of
your head!

Ohhhh, there it is. Maybe it slipped while I was
sleeping.
Shido, the rag's not your glasses.

(All right. Seems like Yoshino-oneechan is getting
the hang of it. I actually look pretty dumb now,
but I did go all out... I'm going to keep it up!)
Hmm, the vacuum isn't turning on.

Shido, that's a planter. The vacuum is...
this one.
How weird. It's not turning on!
Shido, it's not plugged in.
*Pant, pant, pant*...

(I think I did pretty well. Despite going around
in circles, I finally cleaned my room. It made
me twice as tired, though...)

This is the end. Yoshino-oneechan, please tell me
if there are any issues.
Yoshino, I think you're not done under the\nbeddd.
Shido, you have... forgotten under the bed!

Got it. Under the bed, huh? There's a magazine...
C-Crap!
My, myyy, Shido-kun. You hid something there,\ndidn't you? Looks like a magazine. You have to put\nit on the bookshelf where it belongs.
Shido... Please clean!

Y-You've betrayed me, Yoshinon! I thought you were
my ally...!
Hm, I have no idea what you're talking about.\nYoshino, seems like Shido-kun has a naughty\nmagazine.
Sh-Shido! Th-That is not acceptable!
F-Forgive me, onee-chan!

(Yoshino-oneechan gave me a judgmental look for a
little while.)
Phew. I'm mostly done, all thanks to you.
You're... welcome...
Good job, Shido.

You're going to spend the night, right? I'll cook
something delicious today to show my appreciation.
Just you wait.
Shido... Your cooking is delicious.

But, it's too early for food... I know, why don't
we eat some ice cream?
...! Shido, that's a good idea.
Shido-kun, get me one too.
All right, got it!

(Yoshino-oneechan has a tendency to be childish,
but she's an awesome sister, always caring about
her brother. I'm lucky to have her.)
